00019 #define SELECT_WIDTH 0.08
00020 #define SELECT_DEPTH 0.05
00021 
00022 using std::min;
00023 using std::max;
00024 
00025 XQGraphPainter::XQGraphPainter(const shared_ptr<XGraph> &graph, XQGraph* item) :
00026     m_graph(graph),
00027     m_pItem(item),
00028     m_selectionStateNow(Selecting),
00029     m_selectionModeNow(SelNone),
00030     m_listpoints(0),
00031     m_listaxes(0),
00032     m_listgrids(0),
00033     m_listplanes(0),
00034     m_bIsRedrawNeeded(true),
00035     m_bIsAxisRedrawNeeded(false),
00036     m_bTilted(false),
00037     m_bReqHelp(false)
00038 {
00039     openFont();
00040     item->m_painter.reset(this);
00041     m_lsnRedraw = graph->onUpdate().connectWeak(
00042         shared_from_this(), &XQGraphPainter::onRedraw,
00043         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP | XListener::FLAG_DELAY_ADAPTIVE);
00044 }
00045 
00046 float
00047 XQGraphPainter::resScreen() {
00048     return 1.0f/max(m_pItem->width(), m_pItem->height());
00049 } 
00050 
00051 void
00052 XQGraphPainter::repaintGraph(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
00053 {
00054     repaintBuffer(x1, y1, x2, y2);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void
00058 XQGraphPainter::posOffAxis(const XGraph::ScrPoint &dir, 
00059                            XGraph::ScrPoint *src, XGraph::SFloat offset) {
00060     XGraph::ScrPoint scr, dir_proj;
00061     windowToScreen(m_pItem->width() / 2, m_pItem->height() / 2, 0.0, &scr);
00062     windowToScreen(m_pItem->width() / 2, m_pItem->height() / 2, 1.0, &dir_proj);
00063     dir_proj -= scr;
00064     dir_proj.normalize();
00065     double x, y, z;
00066     if(screenToWindow(*src, &x, &y, &z)) return;
00067     x = x / m_pItem->width() - 0.5;
00068     y = y / m_pItem->height() - 0.5;
00069     double r1 = x*x + y*y;
00070     XGraph::ScrPoint s1 = dir_proj;
00071     s1.vectorProduct(dir);
00072     s1.normalize();
00073     s1 *= offset;
00074     *src += s1;
00075     int ret = screenToWindow(*src, &x, &y, &z);
00076     x = x / m_pItem->width() - 0.5;
00077     y = y / m_pItem->height() - 0.5;
00078     double r2 = x*x + y*y;
00079     if(ret || ((r2 - r1) * offset < 0) ) {
00080         *src -= s1;
00081         *src -= s1;
00082     }
00083 }
00084 
00085 shared_ptr<XAxis> 
00086 XQGraphPainter::findAxis(const XGraph::ScrPoint &s1)
00087 {
00088     shared_ptr<XAxis> found_axis;
00089     double zmin = 0.1;
00090     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(m_graph->axes()->children());
00091     if(axes_list) { 
00092         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = axes_list->begin(); it != axes_list->end(); it++)
00093         {
00094             shared_ptr<XAxis> axis = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(*it);
00095             XGraph::SFloat z1;
00096             XGraph::ScrPoint s2;
00097             axis->axisToScreen(axis->screenToAxis(s1), &s2);
00098             z1 = sqrtf(s1.distance2(s2));
00099             if(zmin > z1) {
00100                 zmin = z1;
00101                 found_axis = axis;
00102             }
00103         }
00104     }
00105     return found_axis;
00106 }
00107 shared_ptr<XPlot> 
00108 XQGraphPainter::findPlane(const XGraph::ScrPoint &s1,
00109                           shared_ptr<XAxis> *axis1, shared_ptr<XAxis> *axis2)
00110 {
00111     double zmin = 0.1;
00112     shared_ptr<XPlot> plot_found;
00113     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> plots_list(m_graph->plots()->children());
00114     if(plots_list) { 
00115         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = plots_list->begin(); it != plots_list->end(); it++)
00116         {
00117             shared_ptr<XPlot> plot = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPlot>(*it);
00118             XGraph::GPoint g1;
00119             shared_ptr<XAxis> axisx = *plot->axisX();
00120             shared_ptr<XAxis> axisy = *plot->axisY();
00121             shared_ptr<XAxis> axisz = *plot->axisZ();
00122             plot->screenToGraph(s1, &g1);
00123             if((fabs(g1.x) < zmin) && axisz) {
00124                 plot_found = plot;
00125                 zmin = fabs(g1.x);
00126                 *axis1 = axisy;
00127                 *axis2 = axisz;
00128             }
00129             if((fabs(g1.y) < zmin) && axisz) {
00130                 plot_found = plot;
00131                 zmin = fabs(g1.y);
00132                 *axis1 = axisx;
00133                 *axis2 = axisz;
00134             }
00135             if(fabs(g1.z) < zmin) {
00136                 plot_found = plot;
00137                 zmin = fabs(g1.z);
00138                 *axis1 = axisx;
00139                 *axis2 = axisy;
00140             }
00141         }       
00142     }
00143     return plot_found;
00144 }
00145 
00146 void
00147 XQGraphPainter::selectObjs(int x, int y, SelectionState state, SelectionMode mode)
00148 {
00149     m_pointerLastPos[0] = x;
00150     m_pointerLastPos[1] = y;
00151 
00152     if(m_bReqHelp) {
00153         if(state != SelStart) return;
00154         m_bReqHelp = false;
00155         return;
00156     }
00157     double z;
00158     
00159     m_selectionStateNow = state;
00160     switch(state) {
00161     case SelStart:
00162         m_selectionModeNow = mode;
00163         m_selStartPos[0] = x;
00164         m_selStartPos[1] = y;
00165         m_tiltLastPos[0] = x;
00166         m_tiltLastPos[1] = y;
00167         switch(mode) {
00168         case SelPlane:
00169             m_foundPlane.reset();
00170             z = selectPlane(x, y, 
00171                             (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->width()), 
00172                             (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->height()),
00173                             &m_startScrPos, &m_startScrDX, &m_startScrDY);
00174             if(z < 1.0)
00175                 m_foundPlane = findPlane(m_startScrPos, &m_foundPlaneAxis1, &m_foundPlaneAxis2);
00176             m_finishScrPos = m_startScrPos;
00177             break;
00178         case SelAxis:
00179             m_foundAxis.reset();
00180             z = selectAxis(x, y, 
00181                            (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->width()),
00182                            (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->height()),
00183                            &m_startScrPos, &m_startScrDX, &m_startScrDY);
00184             if(z < 1.0) m_foundAxis = findAxis(m_startScrPos);
00185             m_finishScrPos = m_startScrPos;
00186             break;
00187         default:
00188             break;
00189         }
00190         break;
00191     case Selecting:
00192         //restore mode
00193         mode = m_selectionModeNow;
00194         break;
00195     case SelFinish:
00196         //restore mode
00197         mode = m_selectionModeNow;
00198         m_selectionModeNow = SelNone;
00199         break;
00200     }
00201     switch(mode) {
00202     case SelNone:
00203         m_foundPlane.reset();
00204         z = selectPlane(x, y, 
00205                         (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->width()),
00206                         (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->height()),
00207                         &m_finishScrPos, &m_finishScrDX, &m_finishScrDY);
00208         if(z < 1.0)
00209             m_foundPlane = findPlane(m_finishScrPos, &m_foundPlaneAxis1, &m_foundPlaneAxis2);
00210         break;
00211     case SelPlane:
00212         selectPlane(x, y, 
00213                     (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->width()),
00214                     (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->height()),
00215                     &m_finishScrPos, &m_finishScrDX, &m_finishScrDY);
00216         break;
00217     case SelAxis:
00218         selectAxis(x, y, 
00219                    (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->width()),
00220                    (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->height()),
00221                    &m_finishScrPos, &m_finishScrDX, &m_finishScrDY);
00222         break;
00223     case TiltTracking:
00224     {
00225         float x0 = (float)m_tiltLastPos[0] / m_pItem->width() - 0.5;
00226         float y0 = (1.0f - (float)m_tiltLastPos[1] / m_pItem->height()) - 0.5;
00227         float z0 = 0.5;
00228         float x1 = (float)x / m_pItem->width() - 0.5;
00229         float y1 = (1.0f - (float)y / m_pItem->height()) - 0.5;
00230         float z1 = z0;
00231         float x2, y2, z2;
00232         x2 = y0 * z1 - z0 * y1;
00233         y2 = z0 * x1 - x0 * z1;
00234         z2 = x0 * y1 - y0 * x1;
00235         float k = sqrt(x2*x2 + y2*y2 + z2*z2);
00236         x2 /= k; y2 /= k; z2 /= k;
00237         viewRotate( -pow(k/(z0/4), 1.4f)*90, x2, y2, z2);
00238         m_tiltLastPos[0] = x;
00239         m_tiltLastPos[1] = y;
00240     }
00241     break;
00242     default:
00243         break;
00244     }
00245     if(state == SelFinish) {
00246         if((abs(x - m_selStartPos[0]) < 3) && (abs(y - m_selStartPos[1]) < 3)) {
00247             switch(mode) {
00248             case SelPlane:
00249                 break;
00250             case SelAxis:
00251             {
00252                 XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00253                 if(!m_foundAxis) {
00254                     //if no axis, autoscale all axes
00255                     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(m_graph->axes()->children());
00256                     if(axes_list) { 
00257                         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = axes_list->begin(); it != axes_list->end(); it++)
00258                         {
00259                             shared_ptr<XAxis> axis = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(*it);
00260                             if(axis->autoScale()->isUIEnabled())
00261                                 axis->autoScale()->value(true);
00262                         }
00263                     }
00264                 }
00265                 else {
00266                     if(m_foundAxis->autoScale()->isUIEnabled())
00267                         m_foundAxis->autoScale()->value(true);
00268                 }
00269             }
00270             break;
00271             case TiltTracking:
00272                 viewRotate(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, true);
00273                 break;
00274             default:
00275                 break;
00276             }
00277         }
00278         else {
00279             XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00280             switch(mode) {
00281             case SelPlane:
00282                 if(m_foundPlane && !(m_startScrPos == m_finishScrPos) ) {
00283                     XGraph::VFloat src1 = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_startScrPos);
00284                     XGraph::VFloat src2 = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_startScrPos);
00285                     XGraph::VFloat dst1 = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00286                     XGraph::VFloat dst2 = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00287                 
00288                     if(m_foundPlaneAxis1->minValue()->isUIEnabled())
00289                         m_foundPlaneAxis1->minValue()->value(double(min(src1, dst1)));
00290                     if(m_foundPlaneAxis1->maxValue()->isUIEnabled())
00291                         m_foundPlaneAxis1->maxValue()->value(double(max(src1, dst1)));
00292                     if(m_foundPlaneAxis1->autoScale()->isUIEnabled())
00293                         m_foundPlaneAxis1->autoScale()->value(false);
00294                     if(m_foundPlaneAxis2->minValue()->isUIEnabled())
00295                         m_foundPlaneAxis2->minValue()->value(double(min(src2, dst2)));
00296                     if(m_foundPlaneAxis2->maxValue()->isUIEnabled())
00297                         m_foundPlaneAxis2->maxValue()->value(double(max(src2, dst2)));
00298                     if(m_foundPlaneAxis2->autoScale()->isUIEnabled())
00299                         m_foundPlaneAxis2->autoScale()->value(false);
00300                 
00301                 }
00302                 break;
00303             case SelAxis:
00304                 if(m_foundAxis && !(m_startScrPos == m_finishScrPos) ) {
00305                     XGraph::VFloat src = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_startScrPos);
00306                     XGraph::VFloat dst = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00307                     double _min = std::min(src, dst);
00308                     double _max = std::max(src, dst);
00309                     if(m_foundAxis->minValue()->isUIEnabled())
00310                         m_foundAxis->minValue()->value(_min);
00311                     if(m_foundAxis->maxValue()->isUIEnabled())
00312                         m_foundAxis->maxValue()->value(_max);
00313                     if(m_foundAxis->autoScale()->isUIEnabled())
00314                         m_foundAxis->autoScale()->value(false);
00315                 }
00316                 break;
00317             default:
00318                 break;
00319             }
00320         }
00321     }
00322     
00323     repaintGraph(0, 0, m_pItem->width(), m_pItem->height() );
00324 }
00325 
00326 void
00327 XQGraphPainter::wheel(int x, int y, double deg)
00328 {
00329     double a = ((double)x / m_pItem->width() - 0.5);
00330     double b = ((double)y / m_pItem->height() - 0.5);
00331     if( max(fabs(a), fabs(b)) < 0.35) {
00332         zoom(min(1.15, max(0.85, exp(deg * 0.04))), x, y);
00333     }
00334     else {
00335         if( (a - b) * (a + b) > 0 ) {
00336             viewRotate(30.0 * deg / fabs(deg), -1.0, 0.0, 0.0, false);
00337         }
00338         else {
00339             viewRotate(30.0 * deg / fabs(deg), 0.0, 1.0, 0.0, false);
00340         }
00341         repaintGraph(0, 0, m_pItem->width(), m_pItem->height() );
00342     }
00343 }
00344 void
00345 XQGraphPainter::zoom(double zoomscale, int , int )
00346 {
00347     XGraph::ScrPoint s1(0.5, 0.5, 0.5);
00348   
00349     XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00350     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(m_graph->axes()->children());
00351     if(axes_list) { 
00352         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = axes_list->begin(); it != axes_list->end(); it++)
00353         {
00354             shared_ptr<XAxis> axis = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(*it);
00355             if(axis->autoScale()->isUIEnabled())
00356                 axis->autoScale()->value(false);
00357         }
00358     }
00359     m_graph->zoomAxes(resScreen(), zoomscale, s1);
00360 }
00361 void
00362 XQGraphPainter::onRedraw(const shared_ptr<XGraph> &)
00363 {
00364     redrawOffScreen();
00365     repaintGraph(0, 0, m_pItem->width(), m_pItem->height() );  
00366 }
00367 void
00368 XQGraphPainter::drawOnScreenObj()
00369 {
00370     QString msg = "";
00371 //   if(SelectionStateNow != Selecting) return;
00372     switch ( m_selectionModeNow )
00373     {
00374     case SelNone:
00375         if(m_foundPlane) {
00376             XGraph::VFloat dst1 = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00377             XGraph::VFloat dst1dx = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_finishScrDX) - dst1;
00378             XGraph::VFloat dst1dy = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_finishScrDY) - dst1;
00379             XGraph::VFloat dst2 = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00380             XGraph::VFloat dst2dx = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_finishScrDX) - dst2;
00381             XGraph::VFloat dst2dy = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_finishScrDY) - dst2;
00382 
00383             dst1 = setprec(dst1, sqrt(dst1dx*dst1dx + dst1dy*dst1dy));
00384             dst2 = setprec(dst2, sqrt(dst2dx*dst2dx + dst2dy*dst2dy));
00385             msg += QString("(%1, %2)")
00386                 .arg(m_foundPlaneAxis1->valToString(dst1).c_str())
00387                 .arg(m_foundPlaneAxis2->valToString(dst2).c_str());
00388         }
00389         else {
00390             msg = i18n("R-DBL-CLICK TO SHOW HELP").toUtf8().data();
00391         }
00392         break;
00393     case SelPlane:
00394         if(m_foundPlane && !(m_startScrPos == m_finishScrPos) ) {
00395             XGraph::VFloat src1 = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_startScrPos);
00396             XGraph::VFloat src1dx = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_startScrDX) - src1;
00397             XGraph::VFloat src1dy = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_startScrDY) - src1;
00398             XGraph::VFloat src2 = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_startScrPos);
00399             XGraph::VFloat src2dx = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_startScrDX) - src2;
00400             XGraph::VFloat src2dy = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_startScrDY) - src2;
00401             XGraph::VFloat dst1 = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00402             XGraph::VFloat dst1dx = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_finishScrDX) - dst1;
00403             XGraph::VFloat dst1dy = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_finishScrDY) - dst1;
00404             XGraph::VFloat dst2 = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00405             XGraph::VFloat dst2dx = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_finishScrDX) - dst2;
00406             XGraph::VFloat dst2dy = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_finishScrDY) - dst2;
00407 
00408             src1 = setprec(src1, sqrt(src1dx*src1dx + src1dy*src1dy));
00409             src2 = setprec(src2, sqrt(src2dx*src2dx + src2dy*src2dy));
00410             dst1 = setprec(dst1, sqrt(dst1dx*dst1dx + dst1dy*dst1dy));
00411             dst2 = setprec(dst2, sqrt(dst2dx*dst2dx + dst2dy*dst2dy));
00412             msg += QString("(%1, %2) - (%3, %4)")
00413                 .arg(m_foundPlaneAxis1->valToString(src1).c_str())
00414                 .arg(m_foundPlaneAxis2->valToString(src2).c_str())
00415                 .arg(m_foundPlaneAxis1->valToString(dst1).c_str())
00416                 .arg(m_foundPlaneAxis2->valToString(dst2).c_str());
00417         
00418             XGraph::ScrPoint sd1, sd2;
00419             m_foundPlaneAxis1->valToScreen(dst1, &sd1);
00420             m_foundPlaneAxis1->valToScreen(src1, &sd2);
00421             sd1 -= sd2;
00422             sd1 += m_startScrPos;
00423             XGraph::ScrPoint ss1, ss2;
00424             m_foundPlaneAxis2->valToScreen(dst2, &ss1);
00425             m_foundPlaneAxis2->valToScreen(src2, &ss2);
00426             ss1 -= ss2;
00427             ss1 += m_startScrPos;
00428         
00429             beginQuad(true);
00430             setColor(clBlue, 0.2);
00431             setVertex(m_startScrPos);
00432             setVertex(sd1);
00433             setVertex(m_finishScrPos);
00434             setVertex(ss1);
00435             endQuad();
00436         }
00437         break;
00438     case SelAxis:
00439         if(m_foundAxis && !(m_startScrPos == m_finishScrPos) ) {
00440             XGraph::VFloat src = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_startScrPos);
00441             XGraph::VFloat srcdx = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_startScrDX) - src;
00442             XGraph::VFloat srcdy = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_startScrDY) - src;
00443             XGraph::VFloat dst = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00444             XGraph::VFloat dstdx = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_finishScrDX) - dst;
00445             XGraph::VFloat dstdy = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_finishScrDY) - dst;
00446                 
00447             src = setprec(src, sqrt(srcdx*srcdx + srcdy*srcdy));
00448             dst = setprec(dst, sqrt(dstdx*dstdx + dstdy*dstdy));
00449         
00450             msg += QString("%1 - %2")
00451                 .arg(m_foundAxis->valToString(src).c_str())
00452                 .arg(m_foundAxis->valToString(dst).c_str());
00453         
00454             XGraph::GFloat src1 = m_foundAxis->valToAxis(src);
00455             XGraph::GFloat dst1 = m_foundAxis->valToAxis(dst);      
00456             beginQuad(true);
00457             setColor( clRed, 0.4 );
00458             XGraph::ScrPoint s1, s2, s3, s4;
00459             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(src1, &s1);
00460             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s1, -0.02);
00461             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(src1, &s2);
00462             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s2, +0.02);
00463             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(dst1, &s3);
00464             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s3, +0.02);
00465             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(dst1, &s4);
00466             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s4, -0.02);
00467             setVertex(s1);
00468             setVertex(s2);
00469             setVertex(s3);
00470             setVertex(s4);
00471             endQuad();
00472             beginLine();
00473             setColor( clBlue, 1.0 );
00474             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(src1, &s1);
00475             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s1, -0.1);
00476             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(src1, &s2);
00477             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s2, 0.05);
00478             setVertex(s1);
00479             setVertex(s2);
00480             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(dst1, &s1);
00481             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s1, -0.1);
00482             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(dst1, &s2);
00483             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s2, 0.05);
00484             setVertex(s1);
00485             setVertex(s2);
00486             endLine();
00487         }
00488         break;
00489     case TiltTracking:
00490         break;
00491     default:
00492         break;
00493     }
00494     m_onScreenMsg = msg.toUtf8().data();
00495 }
00496 void
00497 XQGraphPainter::showHelp()
00498 {
00499     m_bReqHelp = true;
00500     repaintGraph(0, 0, m_pItem->width(), m_pItem->height());
00501 }
00502 void
00503 XQGraphPainter::drawOnScreenViewObj()
00504 {
00505     //Draw Title
00506     setColor(*m_graph->titleColor());
00507     defaultFont();
00508     m_curAlign = Qt::AlignTop | Qt::AlignHCenter;
00509     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(0.5, 0.99, 0.01), *m_graph->label());
00510   
00511     if(m_onScreenMsg.length() ) {
00512         selectFont(m_onScreenMsg, XGraph::ScrPoint(0.6, 0.05, 0.01), XGraph::ScrPoint(1, 0, 0), XGraph::ScrPoint(0, 0.05, 0), 0);
00513         setColor(*m_graph->titleColor());
00514         m_curAlign = Qt::AlignBottom | Qt::AlignLeft;
00515         drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(0.01, 0.01, 0.01), m_onScreenMsg);
00516     }
00517     //Legends
00518     if(*m_graph->drawLegends() &&
00519             (m_selectionModeNow == SelNone)) {
00520         atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> plots_list(m_graph->plots()->children());
00521         if(plots_list && plots_list->size()) {
00522             float z = 0.98;
00523             float dy = 0.04;
00524             float x1 = 0.75;
00525             float y1 = 0.81;
00526             if(m_pointerLastPos[0] > m_pItem->width() / 2)
00527                 x1 = 1.06f - x1;
00528             if(m_pointerLastPos[1] < m_pItem->height() / 2)
00529                 y1 = 1.0f - y1 + plots_list->size() * dy;
00530             float x2 = x1 - 0.01;
00531             float x3 = x1 + 0.08;
00532             defaultFont();
00533             m_curAlign = Qt::AlignVCenter | Qt::AlignRight;
00534             float y2 = y1;
00535             for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = plots_list->begin(); it != plots_list->end(); it++)
00536             {
00537                 shared_ptr<XPlot> plot = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPlot>(*it);
00538                 selectFont(*plot->label(), XGraph::ScrPoint(x2,y2,z), XGraph::ScrPoint(1, 0, 0), XGraph::ScrPoint(0, dy, 0), 0);
00539                 y2 -= dy;
00540             }
00541             setColor(*m_graph->backGround(), 0.7);
00542             beginQuad(true);
00543             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x1, y1 + dy/2, z));
00544             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x1, y2 + dy/2, z));
00545             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x3, y2 + dy/2, z));
00546             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x3, y1 + dy/2, z));
00547             endQuad();
00548             setColor(*m_graph->titleColor(), 0.05);
00549             beginQuad(true);
00550             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x1, y1 + dy/2, z));
00551             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x1, y2 + dy/2, z));
00552             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x3, y2 + dy/2, z));
00553             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x3, y1 + dy/2, z));
00554             endQuad();
00555             m_curAlign = Qt::AlignVCenter | Qt::AlignRight;
00556             float y = y1;
00557             for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = plots_list->begin(); it != plots_list->end(); it++)
00558             {
00559                 setColor(*m_graph->titleColor(), 1.0);
00560                 shared_ptr<XPlot> plot = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPlot>(*it);
00561                 drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x2,y,z), *plot->label());
00562                 plot->drawLegend(this, XGraph::ScrPoint((x3 + x1)/2, y, z), (x3 - x1)/1.5f, dy/1.2f);
00563                 y -= dy;
00564             }
00565         }
00566     }
00567     
00568     if(m_bReqHelp) drawOnScreenHelp();
00569 }
00570 void
00571 XQGraphPainter::drawOnScreenHelp()
00572 {
00573     float z = 0.99;
00574     setColor(*m_graph->backGround(), 0.3);
00575     beginQuad(true);
00576     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(0.0, 0.0, z));
00577     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(1.0, 0.0, z));
00578     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(1.0, 1.0, z));
00579     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(0.0, 1.0, z));
00580     endQuad();
00581     setColor(*m_graph->titleColor(), 0.55);
00582     double y = 1.0;
00583     beginQuad(true);
00584     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(1.0 - y, 1.0 - y, z));
00585     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(1.0 - y, y, z));
00586     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(y, y, z));
00587     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(y, 1.0 - y, z));
00588     endQuad();
00589     y -= 0.02;
00590     setColor(*m_graph->backGround(), 1.0);
00591     defaultFont();
00592     m_curAlign = Qt::AlignTop | Qt::AlignHCenter;
00593     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(0.5, y, z), i18n("QUICK HELP!").toUtf8().data());
00594     m_curAlign = Qt::AlignVCenter | Qt::AlignLeft;
00595     y -= 0.1;
00596     double x = 0.1;
00597     double dy = -y/10;
00598     selectFont(i18n("Single Click Right Button on Axis : Auto-scale").toUtf8().data(), XGraph::ScrPoint(x,y,z), XGraph::ScrPoint(1, 0, 0), XGraph::ScrPoint(0, dy, 0), 0);
00599     
00600     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), i18n("Press Left Button on Plot : Manual Scale").toUtf8().data());
00601     y += dy;
00602     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), i18n("Press Right Button along Axis: Manual Scale").toUtf8().data());
00603     y += dy;
00604     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), i18n("Single Click Right Button on Axis : Auto-scale").toUtf8().data());
00605     y += dy;
00606     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), i18n("Single Click Right Button elsewhere : Auto-scale all").toUtf8().data());
00607     y += dy;
00608     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), i18n("Press Middle Button : Tilt plots").toUtf8().data());
00609     y += dy;
00610     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), i18n("Single Click Middle Button : Reset tilting").toUtf8().data());
00611     y += dy;
00612     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), i18n("Wheel around Center : (Un)Zoom all Plots").toUtf8().data());
00613     y += dy;
00614     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), i18n("Wheel at Side : Tilt by 30deg.").toUtf8().data());
00615     y += dy;
00616     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), i18n("Double Click Left Button : Show Dialog").toUtf8().data());
00617     y += dy;
00618     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), i18n("Double Click Right Button : This Help").toUtf8().data());
00619 }

00621 void
00622 XQGraphPainter::drawOffScreenStart()
00623 {
00624     m_graph->setupRedraw(resScreen());
00625 }
00626 void
00627 XQGraphPainter::drawOffScreenPlanes()
00628 {
00629     setColor((QRgb)*m_graph->backGround(), 0.3);
00630     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> plots_list(m_graph->plots()->children());
00631     if(plots_list) { 
00632         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = plots_list->begin(); it != plots_list->end(); it++)
00633         {
00634             shared_ptr<XPlot> plot = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPlot>(*it);
00635             XGraph::GPoint g1(0.0, 0.0, 0.0),
00636                 g2(1.0, 0.0, 0.0),
00637                 g3(0.0, 1.0, 0.0),
00638                 g4(1.0, 1.0, 0.0),
00639                 g5(0.0, 0.0, 1.0),
00640                 g6(0.0, 1.0, 1.0),
00641                 g7(1.0, 0.0, 1.0),
00642                 g8(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00643             XGraph::ScrPoint s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, s6, s7, s8;
00644             plot->graphToScreen(g1, &s1);
00645             plot->graphToScreen(g2, &s2);
00646             plot->graphToScreen(g3, &s3);
00647             plot->graphToScreen(g4, &s4);
00648             plot->graphToScreen(g5, &s5);
00649             plot->graphToScreen(g6, &s6);
00650             plot->graphToScreen(g7, &s7);
00651             plot->graphToScreen(g8, &s8);
00652             beginQuad(true);
00653             setColor( *m_graph->backGround(), 0.2);
00654             setVertex(s1);
00655             setVertex(s2);
00656             setVertex(s4);
00657             setVertex(s3);
00658             shared_ptr<XAxis> axisz = *plot->axisZ();
00659             if(axisz) {
00660                 setVertex(s1);
00661                 setVertex(s2);
00662                 setVertex(s7);
00663                 setVertex(s5);
00664                 setVertex(s1);
00665                 setVertex(s3);
00666                 setVertex(s6);
00667                 setVertex(s5);
00668             }
00669             endQuad();
00670         }
00671     }
00672 }
00673 void
00674 XQGraphPainter::drawOffScreenGrids()
00675 {
00676     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> plots_list(m_graph->plots()->children());
00677     if(plots_list) { 
00678         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = plots_list->begin(); it != plots_list->end(); it++)
00679         {
00680             shared_ptr<XPlot> plot = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPlot>(*it);
00681             plot->drawGrid(this, m_bTilted);
00682         }
00683     }
00684 }
00685 void
00686 XQGraphPainter::drawOffScreenPoints()
00687 {
00688     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> plots_list(m_graph->plots()->children());
00689     if(plots_list) { 
00690         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = plots_list->begin(); it != plots_list->end(); it++)
00691         {
00692             shared_ptr<XPlot> plot = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPlot>(*it);
00693             plot->drawPlot(this);
00694         }
00695     }
00696 }
00697 void
00698 XQGraphPainter::drawOffScreenAxes()
00699 {
00700     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(m_graph->axes()->children());
00701     if(axes_list) { 
00702         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = axes_list->begin(); it != axes_list->end(); it++)
00703         {
00704             shared_ptr<XAxis> axis = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(*it);
00705             if((axis->direction() != XAxis::DirAxisZ) || m_bTilted)
00706                 axis->drawAxis(this);
00707         }
00708     }
00709 }
